titleStmt.title: Precepts for Christian practice; or The rule of the new creature, containing duties to bee daily observed by every beleever.
titleStmt.author: Reyner, Edward, 1600-1668.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, corrected, inlarged, and now published according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Rich. Cotes for John Bellamie, and are to be sold at his shop at the three Golden Lyons in Cornehill, neere the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan. 31 1644"; the 5 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the three Golden Lyons in Cornehill, neere the Royall Exchange
